channel.title: [HOW] Adding a limit to how many people may enter your server
channel.description:
How can i add a limit to how many people can enter my server. Can this be done or not? I just want to reduce lag since when over 10 player's enter the server lags.
Any help would be great.

item.title: [HOW] Adding a limit to how many people may enter your server

item.description:
@lynx_16 wrote:

Here:

Search:

public static final int maxPlayers = 200;

Change the 200 to 10 if your server alg at 10…

SHould be like this after:

public static final int maxPlayers = 10;
